alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stokes and southwestern Rockingham Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Capella, or near Danbury, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayodan... Madison... Walnut Cove... Danbury... King... Pine Hall... and Intelligence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
